name: part_010
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka performing the song 'STARTING OVER' on stage with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: It's finally the true end
subtitles.english: It's finally the true end

subtitles.original: I'm ready for... my destiny
subtitles.english: I'm ready for... my destiny

subtitles.original: It's finally the true end
subtitles.english: It's finally the true end

subtitles.original: I'm ready for... STARTING OVER
subtitles.english: I'm ready for... STARTING OVER

subtitles.original: やっと幕を下ろせた 最期の瞬間まで
subtitles.english: Finally let the curtain fall, until the very last moment

subtitles.original: わたしは精一杯に わたしをやりきった
subtitles.english: I gave it my all, I lived as myself to the fullest

subtitles.original: 終演の続きは 誰も知らなくていい
subtitles.english: No one needs to know what happens after the show ends

subtitles.original: 涙を置いて 新しい旅に出よう
subtitles.english: Leave the tears behind, let's set out on a new journey

subtitles.original: 熱狂はあなたを選ぶ 違う結末だっただけ
subtitles.english: The frenzy chooses you, it was just a different ending

subtitles.original: 同じ愛になれなかった Destiny
subtitles.english: We couldn't become the same love, Destiny

subtitles.original: これまでの全てを 差し出すような愛だった
subtitles.english: It was a love where I offered up everything until now

subtitles.original: 世界の意味が変わるくらいに 肯定された気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt affirmed enough to change the meaning of the world

subtitles.original: 何気なさの中で 気づけた最初の奇跡が
subtitles.english: The first miracle I realized amidst the casualness

subtitles.original: あなたでよかった わたしでよかった
subtitles.english: I'm glad it was you, I'm glad it was me

subtitles.original: 心から思えたよ
subtitles.english: I could feel that from the bottom of my heart

subtitles.original: ずっと遠い未来も ちゃんと覚えていよう
subtitles.english: Even in the far distant future, let's remember properly

subtitles.original: 自分の抱きしめ方 明日の願いかた
subtitles.english: How to embrace myself, how to wish for tomorrow

subtitles.original: あなたががいなくても わたしの片隅で
subtitles.english: Even if you aren't here, in a corner of my heart

subtitles.original: 優しい光 消えたりしないとわかる
subtitles.english: I know the gentle light won't vanish

subtitles.original: 今はまだ手を振れるほど 道は別れたばかりで
subtitles.english: Right now, we've only just parted ways, close enough to still wave

subtitles.original: 後ろ髪に風を感じながら
subtitles.english: While feeling the wind on the back of my hair

subtitles.original: それまでの全てが あなたに出会うためだった
subtitles.english: Everything until then was to meet you

subtitles.original: どの瞬間もムダじゃないこと 本当の意味で知れたから
subtitles.english: Because I learned the true meaning that no moment was a waste

subtitles.original: 次の曲がり角も 自分らしさで選べるはず
subtitles.english: I should be able to choose the next turning point with my own style

subtitles.original: いつかに繋がる 新しい一歩
subtitles.english: A new step that connects to someday

subtitles.original: 信じて歩き出そう
subtitles.english: Let's believe and start walking

subtitles.original: 心から誰かを愛せた あの日々は
subtitles.english: Those days when I could love someone from my heart

subtitles.original: 間違いなくわたしの Destiny Ah,
subtitles.english: Were undoubtedly my Destiny, Ah,

subtitles.original: これまでの全てが 新しい力をくれる
subtitles.english: Everything until now gives me new power

subtitles.original: どの瞬間もムダじゃないなら 何が起きても大丈夫だから
subtitles.english: If no moment is wasted, then I'll be okay no matter what happens

subtitles.original: 次の物語も 自分らしさで選べるはず
subtitles.english: I should be able to choose the next story with my own style too

subtitles.original: いつかに繋がる わたしのはじまり
subtitles.english: My beginning that connects to someday

subtitles.original: 信じて歩き出そう
subtitles.english: Let's believe and start walking
